experiences.name: Clay Station Pottery Workshop
experiences.timing: Friday afternoon for a relaxing session
experiences.description: Unleash your inner artist at Clay Station. Get your hands dirty creating unique pottery pieces in a relaxed, social atmosphere. Perfect for solo travelers looking to connect with their creative side.

experiences.name: Beanly The Coffee Tasting Experience
experiences.timing: Friday morning to kickstart the day
experiences.description: Delve into the world of specialty coffee at Beanly The Coffee. Taste different brewing methods and single-origin beans, engaging with the knowledgeable baristas. It's a great way to meet fellow coffee enthusiasts.

experiences.name: The Flying Squirrel Chocolate Workshop
experiences.timing: Friday afternoon to learn chocolate making
experiences.description: Indulge in a hands-on chocolate-making workshop at The Flying Squirrel. Learn about the bean-to-bar process and create your own delicious treats. A sweet experience for solo adventurers.

experiences.name: Kannada Kali - A Language & Culture Immersion
experiences.timing: Friday morning for a cultural dive
experiences.description: Immerse yourself in Kannada culture with a language and heritage walk. Learn basic phrases and explore the historical Basavanagudi area. A unique way to connect with the local community.

experiences.name: Moksha Art Gallery Visit & Curator Chat
experiences.timing: Friday afternoon for an artistic exploration
experiences.description: Explore contemporary Indian art at Moksha Art Gallery. Engage in a conversation with the curator to learn about the artists and their inspirations. A stimulating experience for art lovers.
